category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Mci0PatternPMICountFormat
preference.preference_description: Defines the list of formats used to specify the count in a pattern of PMIs (e.g. 5X, 5Plcs, 5nos, where "5" is the pattern count and "X", "Plcs", "nos" is the format). The default value is "X".
